messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. You are connected with Vivian and a new app appears in which you can connect to anyone only once. At the same time, you have been told that there is no connection between Vivian and Gongxue. From Vivian, what is the connection path that yields the most reward? Please list the student names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the groups of connected students.
Group 1: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue
Group 2: Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, Alice
Group 3: Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Soheil
Group 4: Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Anisha
Group 5: Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, Alice
Group 6: Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha
Group 7: Salma, Shanshan, Vadim
Group 8: Soheil, Alice
Group 9: Durga, Ajit, Anisha
Group 10: Shanshan, Vadim
Group 11: Gongxue, Alice
Group 12: Ajit, Anisha

Step 2: Identify the groups that include Vivian.
Vivian is in Group 1.

Step 3: Identify the groups that do not include Vivian or Gongxue.
These groups are Group 3, Group 6, Group 9, and Group 12.

Step 4: Find the group that has the most connections to Group 1 without including Gongxue.
Group 4 has the most connections to Group 1 without including Gongxue (Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim).

Step 5: Identify the students in Group 4 that are not in Group 1.
Anisha is the only student in Group 4 not in Group 1.

Step 6: Connect to Vivian and then to the students in the path that yields the most reward.
The path that yields the most reward is Vivian -> Salma -> Shanshan -> Vadim -> Anisha.

Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Anisha

teleDetour.parsed_response: Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Anisha
